item.description:
7:15 SHOW IS SOLD OUT!!

NO WORRY, THERE IS A 6:30 SHOW THAT IS NOT SOLD OUT!! IF YOU DON'T HAVE TICKETS FOR FOR EITHER SHOW, PLEASE LET ME KNOW!!! PLEASE INDICATE IN THE COMMENT SECTION!!


Advance Tickets Strongly Recommended!! Have you bought them yet?

The movie starts at 7:15.. We will be gathering earlier and be in the theatre by 7:00. Fandango strongly suggests buying tickets way in advance for this one...

"The most exciting, challenging and significant relationship of all is the one you have with yourself. And if you find someone to love the YOU you love, well, that's just fabulous."..



After the movie
NOTE: IF WE DON'T MEET UP BEFORE BECAUSE OF THE CRAZINESS, WE WILL BE GOING TO
MANTRAhttp://www.mantrarest...
52 TEMPLE PLACE
617 429-9168

Note: After 11pm this place transforms into a club and the kitchen closes at 10:30. Gives us time to enjoy an after discussion and a Cosmo..!! For those of you who want to continue to party, no need to go anywhere else...!!

Synopsis

Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, and Cynthia Nixon reprise their roles from the original HBO series on the big screen. Academy Award-winning actress Jennifer Hudson (Dreamgirls) also joins the cast of the film and will play Carrie Bradshaw's assistant, a new character to be introduced in the film.
Cast: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon, Chris Noth
Director: Michael Patrick King
Genres: Sex Comedy, Comedy, Urban Comedy

Trailer
<object width="425" height="355"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="355" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there with a HUGE SMILE and my SEX and the City T Shirt (or Sweatshirt) and designer Bag Upstairs by grabbing a table by the concession stand. Downstairs, by the rope behind the ticket Taker.
item.why: Because you're still watching the repeats like me!!
item.name: Sex and the City: The Movie / Cosmos at Mantra After...
